monthly_rent_0br.long_description: The Fair Market Rent (FMR) is the 40th percentile of rents.  FMRs are estimated by HUD for metropolitan areas and nonmetropolitan counties.  We used HUD data at the ZIP Code and county levels to compute county and census tract level FMRs.
monthly_rent_0br.short_description: The Fair Market Rent (FMR) is the 40th percentile of rents.

sources.name: US Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD)

monthly_rent_0br.statement: The Fair Market Rent (FMR) for a zero bedroom dwelling in {features.name} is {value}.
